snippet: The center, nearing the end of the renovation and restoration of its neo-Moorish building on West 55th Street, seeks to raise its profile in the city’s cultural life.
lead_paragraph: The center, nearing the end of the renovation and restoration of its neo-Moorish building on West 55th Street, seeks to raise its profile in the city’s cultural life.

headline.main: Countdown at City Center, as Reopening Approaches
headline.print_headline: Countdown At City Center, As Reopening Approaches
headline.seo: City Center Gears Up for Its Grand Reopening
